Final ZPF Configuration

policy-map type inspect InsideToOutside
class class-default
inspect

zone security Inside
description Inside network
zone security Outside
description Outside network
zone-pair security InsideToOutside source Inside destination Outside
service-policy type inspect InsideToOutside

interface FastEthernet0/0

!

zone-member security Outside
Scanning the Protected LAN from the Outside

This scan from an outside host is encouraging. After the firewall policy has been configured, the internal hosts are no longer visible to port scans from the outside. However, the router itself is still vulnerable.
Scanning an External Web Server from the Inside
This scan proves that the inside clients can reach any service or server on the Internet.
Alerts Generated by the Router During Port Scan
Because all the traffic between zones is inspected, a port scan almost always triggers alerts and corresponding log messages.
